long_description:
our mission
make the world brighter. our goal is to build a globally-known, customer focused-brand, trusted for creating benefit-led, high quality, and built to last products. as well as entertaining our community along the way, through our sense of adventure and not taking life too seriously. all while making a positive difference through reducing our footprint as we grow and benefitting the wider global community. let's get those plastic bottles out of the ocean and into some nice stripy towels that last forever. much better. core values be trailblazerswe're ambitious with what we can achieve, as abrand and as people. nothing is impossible. be playful
approach everything with a light-hearted, excitable attitude, while not taking ourselves too seriously (because life is too short for that). be trustworthy
trust us to do the right thing. we'll always be transparent about what we're doing and why, while providing top class service and quality products along the way. be welcoming
embrace difference and encourage individuality, no matter what or who - everyone is welcome. be good to our planet we care for our world and will always strive to do better for it through education and action.

generated_description: the company's mission is to make the world brighter by creating globally-known, customer-focused brands that prioritize creating high-quality, benefit-led, and long-lasting products. they aim to entertain their community through adventure and a sense of humor, while reducing their environmental impact and benefiting the wider global community. their core values include being trailblazers, playful, trustworthy, welcoming, and good to the planet.
